channel.title: Docs on Boring Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Boring Machine Learning

item.title: What is machine learning engineering?
item.description: What is machine learning engineering? # Once, on a crisp cloudless morning in early fall, a machine learning engineer left her home to seek the answers that she could not find, even in the newly-optimized Google results. She closed her laptop, put on her backpack and hiking boots, and walked quietly out her door and past her mailbox, down a dusty path that led past a stream, until the houses around her gave way to broad fields full of ripening corn.

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me # Hi! I’m Vicki. I’m a machine learning engineer at Duo working on ML platforms with deep expertise in YAML indentation. I live in Philly with my family. In my free time, I love to write about Life. I also like to think about what technology means in the context of society, and write about that, as well. My main site is here. I also love tweeting terrible puns and doodling tech logos.
